questions.question: What does this scheduling app do?
questions.answer: Our platform automates shift scheduling for pediatricians, ensuring fair, optimized, and conflict-free work schedules.

questions.question: Who can use this app?
questions.answer: Pediatricians, hospital administrators, HR teams, and clinic managers.

questions.question: How does the app ensure fairness in scheduling?
questions.answer: The system considers workload balance, shift preferences, and legal work-hour limitations.

questions.question: Does this work for private practices as well as hospitals?
questions.answer: Yes, the system is flexible and can handle both small clinics and large hospital departments.

questions.question: How do I sign up?
questions.answer: On desktop computer, click the Sign Up button on the top right of your screen. On mobile, tap the menu button and press Sign Up.

questions.question: Can multiple users from the same hospital access the same schedule?
questions.answer: Currently, only the account that generates a schedule can export and share it manually. We are considering adding collaborative access for multiple users in the future.

questions.question: How does the scheduling system work?
questions.answer: The system uses AI to analyze preferences, minimum and maximum work-hour constraints, and other settings to create optimal shift plans.

questions.question: Can I set preferences for my shifts?
questions.answer: Yes, doctors can set preferences for night shifts, weekends, or specific availability. Holidays can be assigned to selected pediatricians, and the system will keep that in mind when generating a schedule.

questions.question: Can I get notifications about upcoming shifts?
questions.answer: Yes, the app can send email notifications. Push notifications and SMS reminders may be available in future updates.

questions.question: Can I export the schedule?
questions.answer: Yes, schedules can be exported to Excel (with automatic schedule formatting), TSV, CSV, and JSON.

questions.question: Does the app ensure compliance with labor laws and pediatric shift regulations?
questions.answer: Currently, users can set the minimum and maximum work hours for each pediatrician registered. In the future, we are considering implementing various global and regional labor laws to suit your needs.

questions.question: How does the app prevent over-scheduling?
questions.answer: The system enforces fair distribution and flags potential burnout risks. All pediatricians are given equal (or approximately equal) number of work hours.

questions.question: Do you offer a free trial version?
questions.answer: Yes, a free trial is available for new users. You can activate it from the Pricing page.

questions.question: Are there different plans for small clinics vs. large hospitals?
questions.answer: Yes, there are three pre-defined plans for different corporate levels, and custom plans are supported as well.

questions.question: What if my schedule doesn't look right?
questions.answer: To regenerate your schedule, check your dashboard settings (employees, shifts, holidays) and click 'Regenerate Schedule.' If issues persist, visit the Contact Us page to report a problem.

questions.question: How do I contact support?
questions.answer: Go to the Contact Us page, choose a category (e.g., Technical Issue, Feature Request), describe your issue, and submit your request.

questions.question: How do I report an issue or request a feature?
questions.answer: Visit the Contact Us page, select 'Feature Suggestion' or 'Report an Issue,' enter your message, and submit.
